find_doctor_title: Find a practitioner & make an appointment online
step1_description: Find doctors by specialty, name, or city easily using our platform.
step2_description: Choose the time that suits you best and confirm in just a few clicks.
step3_description: Meet the doctor at the clinic or use our teleconsultation service.
tip1: Drink at least 8 glasses of water a day.
tip3: Sleep at least 7 hours a night.
tip4: Eat fruits and vegetables every day.
tip5: Avoid stress as much as possible.
